description: A skilled thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea.
Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson unfold as seen through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.
When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc on Gotham, the Dark Knight must accept one of the greatest psychological tests.
The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
Paranormal investigators work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.
A cowboy doll is accidentally knocked out the window and goes on an adventure to get back home.
A poor yet passionate man falls in love with a rich young woman, giving her a sense of freedom.
Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.
